kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Textfield Value Should Be
kw.msg: Value of text field 'name=firstName' should have been 'John' but was ''.
kw.doc: Verifies text field ``locator`` has exactly text ``expected``.
kw.status: Value of text field 'name=firstName' should have been 'John' but was ''.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Textfield Value Should Be

kw.status: Value of text field 'name=lastName' should have been 'Doe' but was ''.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
